tachyon.master.file

Class FileSystemMaster

  • java.lang.Object
    • tachyon.master.MasterBase
      • tachyon.master.file.FileSystemMaster
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JournalCheckpointStreamable, Master

    public final class FileSystemMaster
extends MasterBase
    The master that handles all file system metadata management.

      • processJournalEntry

        public void processJournalEntry(JournalEntry entry)
                         throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Processes a journal entry and applies it to the master. These entries follow the checkpoint entries.
        Parameters:
        entry - the entry to process to update the state of the master.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • streamToJournalCheckpoint

                               throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: JournalCheckpointStreamable
        Writes to the journal, in a streaming fashion, via the JournalOutputStream
        Parameters:
        outputStream - the output stream to write to for the journal checkpoint.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • start

        public void start(boolean isLeader)
           throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Starts the master, as the leader master or the standby master. Here, the master should initialize state and possibly start threads required for operation. If isLeader is true, the master should also initialize the journal and write the checkpoint file.
        Specified by:
        start in interface Master
        Overrides:
        start in class MasterBase
        Parameters:
        isLeader - if true, the master should behave as the leader master in the system. If false, the master should act as a standby master.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • stop

        public void stop()
          throws IOException
        Description copied from interface: Master
        Stops the master. Here, anything created or started in Master.start(boolean) should be cleaned up and shutdown.
        Specified by:
        stop in interface Master
        Overrides:
        stop in class MasterBase
        Throws:
        IOException

                           BlockInfoException,

      • isDirectory

        public boolean isDirectory(long id)
        Whether the filesystem contains a directory with the id. Called by internal masters.
        Parameters:
        id - id of the directory
        Returns:
        true if there is a directory with the id, false otherwise

      • getFileId

        public long getFileId(TachyonURI path)
               throws IOException
        Returns the file id for a given path. Called via RPC, as well as internal masters. If the given path does not exist in Tachyon, the method attempts to load it from UFS.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to get the file id for
        Returns:
        the file id for a given path, or -1 if there is no file at that path
        Throws:
        IOException

      • getFileInfo

        public FileInfo getFileInfo(long fileId)
                     throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Returns the FileInfo for a given path. Called via RPC, as well as internal masters.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id to get the FileInfo for
        Returns:
        the FileInfo for the given file id
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist

      • getFileInfoList

        public List<FileInfo> getFileInfoList(long fileId)
                               throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Returns a list FileInfo for a given file id. If the given file id is a file, the list only contains a single object. If it is a directory, the resulting list contains all direct children of the directory. Called via RPC, as well as internal masters.
        Parameters:
        fileId -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException

      • completeFile

        public void completeFile(long fileId)
                  throws BlockInfoException,
                         FileDoesNotExistException,
                         InvalidPathException
        Marks a file as completed. After a file is complete, it cannot be written to. Called via RPC.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id to complete.
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException
        BlockInfoException
        InvalidPathException

      • deleteFile

        public boolean deleteFile(long fileId,
                 boolean recursive)
                   throws IOException,
                          FileDoesNotExistException
        Deletes a given file id. Called via RPC.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id to delete
        recursive - if true, will delete all its children.
        Returns:
        true if the file was deleted, false otherwise
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • getFileBlockInfo

                             int fileBlockIndex)
                               throws BlockInfoException,
                                      FileDoesNotExistException,
                                      InvalidPathException
        Returns the FileBlockInfo for given file and block index. Called via RPC.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id to get the info for
        fileBlockIndex - the block index of the file to get the block info for
        Returns:
        the FileBlockInfo for the file and block index
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        BlockInfoException - if the block size is invalid
        InvalidPathException

      • getFileBlockInfoList

        public List<FileBlockInfo> getFileBlockInfoList(long fileId)
                                         throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                                                InvalidPathException
        Returns all the FileBlockInfo of the given file. Called via RPC, and internal masters.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id to get the info for
        Returns:
        a list of FileBlockInfo for all the blocks of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist
        InvalidPathException

        Throws:

      • mkdir

        public InodeTree.CreatePathResult mkdir(TachyonURI path,
                               MkdirOptions options)
                                 throws InvalidPathException,
                                        FileAlreadyExistsException,
                                        IOException
        Creates a directory for a given path. Called via RPC, and internal masters.
        Parameters:
        path - the path of the directory
        options - method options
        Returns:
        a InodeTree.CreatePathResult representing the modified inodes and created inodes during path creation
        Throws:
        InvalidPathException - when the path is invalid, please see documentation on InodeTree.createPath(tachyon.TachyonURI, tachyon.master.file.meta.options.CreatePathOptions) for more details
        FileAlreadyExistsException - when there is already a file at path
        IOException

      • rename

        public boolean rename(long fileId,
             TachyonURI dstPath)
               throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                      InvalidPathException,
                      IOException
        Renames a file to a destination. Called via RPC.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the source file to rename.
        dstPath - the destination path to rename the file to.
        Returns:
        true if the rename was successful
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if a non-existent file is encountered
        InvalidPathException - if an invalid path is encountered
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • setPinned

        public void setPinned(long fileId,
             boolean pinned)
               throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Sets the pin status for a file. If the file is a directory, the pin status will be set recursively to all of its descendants. Called via RPC.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file id to set the pin status for
        pinned - the pin status
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist

      • free

        public boolean free(long fileId,
           boolean recursive)
             throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Frees or evicts all of the blocks of the file from tachyon storage. If the given file is a directory, and the 'recursive' flag is enabled, all descendant files will also be freed. Called via RPC.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the file to free
        recursive - if true, and the file is a directory, all descendants will be freed
        Returns:
        true if the file was freed
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file does not exist

      • getPath

        public TachyonURI getPath(long fileId)
                   throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Gets the path of a file with the given id. Called by the internal web ui.
        Parameters:
        fileId - The id of the file to look up
        Returns:
        the path of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - raise if the file does not exist.

      • getPinIdList

        public Set<Long> getPinIdList()
        Returns:
        the set of inode ids which are pinned. Called via RPC

        Returns:
        the ufs address for this master

        public List<String> getWhiteList()
        Returns:
        the white list. Called by the internal web ui

      • getLostFiles

        Returns:
        all the files lost on the workers

        public void reportLostFile(long fileId)
                    throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException

      • loadMetadata

        public long loadMetadata(TachyonURI path,
                boolean recursive)
                  throws BlockInfoException,
                         FileAlreadyExistsException,
                         FileDoesNotExistException,
                         InvalidPathException,
                         SuspectedFileSizeException,
                         IOException
        Loads metadata for the object identified by the given path from UFS into Tachyon.
        Parameters:
        path - the path for which metadata should be loaded
        recursive - whether parent directories should be created if they do not already exist
        Returns:
        the file id of the loaded path
        Throws:
        BlockInfoException - if an invalid block size is encountered
        FileAlreadyExistsException - if the object to be loaded already exists
        FileDoesNotExistException - if a parent directory does not exist and recursive is false
        InvalidPathException - if invalid path is encountered
        SuspectedFileSizeException - if invalid file size is encountered
        IOException - if an I/O error occurs

      • mount

        public boolean mount(TachyonURI tachyonPath,
            TachyonURI ufsPath)
              throws FileAlreadyExistsException,
                     FileDoesNotExistException,
                     InvalidPathException,
                     IOException
        Throws:
        FileAlreadyExistsException
        FileDoesNotExistException
        InvalidPathException

                throws FileDoesNotExistException,
                       InvalidPathException,
                       IOException
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException
        InvalidPathException
        IOException

      • resetFile

        public void resetFile(long fileId)
               throws FileDoesNotExistException
        Resets a file. It first free the whole file, and then reinitializes it.
        Parameters:
        fileId - the id of the file
        Throws:
        FileDoesNotExistException - if the file doesn't exist
